steps.title: Prepare the Bison Patties
instructions: In a bowl, mix ground bison with minced garlic, Worcestershire sauce, salt, and pepper.
Form the mixture into 4 equal-sized patties.

steps.title: Cook the Burgers
instructions: Heat a grill or skillet to medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate or pan.
Grill the patties for about 5 minutes per side or until they reach the desired doneness.

steps.title: Assemble the Burgers
instructions: Place each patty on a toasted bun, top with a slice of cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, and onion.
Serve with pickles and your choice of condiments.
